text:
I was trying to re-create the Agents.jl logo image at <https://github.com/JuliaDynamics/Agents.jl/blob/master/docs/logo.jl> and after I installed (copied) that font to the same directory, I get this:
```ERROR: LoadError: MethodError: no method matching ContinuousSpace(::Int64)
Closest candidates are:
  ContinuousSpace(::GridSpace{D,P}, ::F, ::Tuple{Vararg{Int64,D}}, ::T, ::Tuple{Vararg{T,D}}) where {D, P, T<:AbstractFloat, F} at /Users/arihuttunen/.julia/packages/Agents/hZaLc/src/spaces/continuous.jl:4
  ContinuousSpace(::Tuple{Vararg{X,D}}) where {D, X<:Real} at /Users/arihuttunen/.julia/packages/Agents/hZaLc/src/spaces/continuous.jl:41
  ContinuousSpace(::Tuple{Vararg{X,D}}, ::Any; update_vel!, periodic) where {D, X<:Real} at /Users/arihuttunen/.julia/packages/Agents/hZaLc/src/spaces/continuous.jl:41
Stacktrace:
 [1] sir_initiation(; infection_period::Int64, reinfection_probability::Float64, isolated::Float64, interaction_radius::Float64, dt::Float64, speed::Float64, death_rate::Float64, N::Int64, initial_infected::Int64, seed::Int64, βmin::Float64, βmax::Float64, init_static::Array{Tuple{Float64,Float64},1}) at /Volumes/MyFiles/Learning/misc-tryout/logo.jl:123
 [2] top-level scope at /Volumes/MyFiles/Learning/misc-tryout/logo.jl:156
in expression starting at /Volumes/MyFiles/Learning/misc-tryout/logo.jl:156```
